OSAsyncChgCompletedEvent.name: OSAsyncChgCompletedEvent
OSAsyncChgCompletedEvent.description: An event that allows the processing of the credit memo, invoices, and other entities after a bulk action has successfully completed. The event provides all of the values that would exist on the synchronous APIs. This object is available in API version 63.0 and later.

ActionType.description: The type of the action that gets applied to Order Summary

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency of the OrderSummary that's associated with the FulfillmentOrder. This field is available only for orgs with multicurrencies enabled.

EventUuid.description: Uniquely identifies an event message. The ID used to match the events that are returned in the callback result with the events in the publish call.

FeeChangeOrderId.description: The change order for the fee ID. This order usually used for invoices.

GrandTotalAmount.description: The new order summary's grand total.

InFulfillmentChangeOrderId.description: The change order for any items during fulfillment.

OrderSummaryId.description: The foreign key for the master Order Summary entity.

PostFulfillmentChangeOrderId.description: The change order for any items post-fulfillment. This ID is used for credit memos refunds

PreFulfillmentChangeOrderId.description: The change order for any items that haven't been fulfilled.

TotalAdjDistAmount.description: The total distributed adjustment amount without taxes.

TotalAdjustedDeliveryAmount.description: The total delivery adjusted amount without taxes.

TotalAdjustedDeliveryTaxAmount.description: The total delivery adjusted tax amount .

TotalAdjustedProductAmount.description: The total adjusted product amount without tax.

TotalAdjustedProductTaxAmount.description: The total adjusted product tax amount.

TotalAmount.description: The total amount, not including taxes.

TotalExcessFundsAmount.description: The amount used to determine if a refund is needed pre-fulfillment.

TotalFeeAmount.description: Total fee amount, not including taxes.

TotalRefundableAmount.description: The amount that can be refunded to the client.

TotalRequiredFundsAmount.description: The total amount of required funds.

TotalTaxAmount.description: The combined total of all taxes.
